p: I SM Black Clerk of the Circuit Court of the County and State aforesaid, do hereby certify that the foregoing copy of decree and judgement has been bt me compared with the original and that it is a correct copy of the whole of such original decree and judgement as the same appears on record at my office and in my custody.
The testimony whereof I have hereinto set my hand and affiized the seal of said courtt this 24th day of June AD 1871
